wikipedia_page.main: Dan Cole (born 9 May 1987) is an English rugby union player who plays prop for Leicester Tigers in Premiership Rugby. Between 2010 and 2019, he played 95 times for England internationally, and was capped three times for the British & Irish Lions. Cole is known for his scrummaging ability. His former coach at Leicester, Richard Cockerill, described him as one of the finest tighthead props in world rugby.
